name: Rise Together
description:
You and a friend control two islands with twin destinies  in a turn-based strategy game. 

In order to flourish, your civilizations need access to food, energy, and the tools to pursue individual and collective happiness. However, as oceans rise around you, the cost of blindly pursuing policies that do not also restore the natural balance becomes more apparent.

Change is difficult, and yet you — as elected leaders of your islands — must band together to lead reluctant populations to a sustainable future before it’s too late.
